skillTree.name: Rotten Soul
skillTree.description: Coeddil's curdled heart attracts the most malignant and terrifying spirits.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

ui_effects.description: ➕100% chance to deal 2 direct damage to 4 entities per second
➕50% chance to deal 150 direct damage to 1 entitiy per second

skillTree.name: Lore of the Forgotten
skillTree.description: Coeddil has weaved the Winds of Magic since the world was in its infancy.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for all spells

skillTree.name: Primeval Hatred
skillTree.description: Even if it takes millennia, every crime committed against the forest shall be accounted for!

skillTree.name: Changing Nature
skillTree.description: Hate can drive one to make... unusual alliances.

skillTree.name: Writhing Branches
skillTree.description: Once, Coeddil brought life wherever he walked. Now what growth he inspires is sour and rotten.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Endurance of the Oak
skillTree.description: Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.

skillTree.name: Impenetrable Bark
skillTree.description: Using the forest itself as a shield, this Lord is protected by their devotion to Athel Loren.

skillTree.name: Tempered Rigour
skillTree.description: When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.

skillTree.name: Violent Delights
skillTree.description: There is no greater thrill than to be in the midst of battle, slaughtering in the forest's name.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 2 seconds
➖ 75% chance to deal 17 damage to 1 entity per second. 510 max damage.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Power of Darkness"

skillTree.name: Flock of Doom
skillTree.description: With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.description: ➕ 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage
➕ 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage
➕ 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage
➕ 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Word of Pain"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Word of Pain Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Word of Pain Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Wyssan's Wildform
skillTree.description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: ➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 0 800 damage and 0 250 explosion damage (10m)
➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 0 800 damage and 0 250 explosion damage (10m)
➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 0 800 damage and 0 250 explosion damage (10m)
➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 0 800 damage and 0 250 explosion damage (10m)
➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 0 800 damage and 0 250 explosion damage (10m)

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Doombolt Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Transformation of Kadon
skillTree.description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Manticore, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.description: ➖ Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Wild Heart
skillTree.description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 13 seconds

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds
➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 2 seconds
➖ 75% chance to deal 17 damage to 1 entity per second. 510 max damage.
➕ 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage

skillTree.name: Howl of the Forest
skillTree.description: The Lord charges their troops to fight for Athel Loren, for their very souls are tethered to its fate.

skillTree.name: Unseelie Court
skillTree.description: Lurking amongst Coeddil’s branches and hollows are swarms of chittering Spites, all drawn to his pungent malice.

effects.description: Cooldown: -30% to Blight of Terrors, Muster of Malevolents, Pageant of Shrikes, and Befuddlement of Mischiefs

skillTree.name: Exile's Return
skillTree.description: Deep within the blackest forests, Coeddil's followers have awaited his return, their seething rage intensified by every passing year.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Dryads, Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units
Passive Ability: Annoyance of Netlings for Dryads units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Glamour Rage
skillTree.description: Pitiful short-lifers, defend your Queen!

skillTree.name: Tainted
skillTree.description: The lingering corruption of Chaos, or perhaps just the rage of an ancient, incomprehensible mind?

effects.description: Attrition suffered by defender: +50% when laying siege

skillTree.name: Wildwood Madness
skillTree.description: For countless years Coeddil has been imprisoned within the Wildwood, held captive by the Elven waystones.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 25% when fighting against Wood Elves
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Elves

skillTree.name: Connected to the Weave
skillTree.description: The Weave is the only true companion for an eternal being.

skillTree.name: Recompense Demanded
skillTree.description: For countless offenses, intrusions, and violations, atonement must be made.

skillTree.name: Intimidating
skillTree.description: You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.

skillTree.name: Hero
skillTree.description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Bard
skillTree.description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.

skillTree.name: Esteemed Combatant
skillTree.description: You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 12%

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Spread Public Order
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.
